alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fillmore; Mower; Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 24 at 10:15PM CST until January 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TUESDAY TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north-central Iowa and southeast Minnesota. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 AM to 9 AM CST Tuesday. For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 AM Tuesday to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
